uvi.description:
drm/ttm: fix memleak in ttm_transfered_destroy

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.157 by commit bd99782f3ca491879e8524c89b1c0f40071903bd. For more details please see the references link.
